topic.title: SITE CODE (REFERRED TO FOR SHARED HIV CARE)
topic.shortdesc: SITE CODE (REFERRED TO FOR SHARED HIV CARE) is the ORGANISATION SITE CODE of the specialist Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) Service where the PATIENT has been referred to for shared care to deal with aspects of their HIV care, but remain under the care of their regular HIV Service.
